column4: an anyone help me I was trying to install ATi Radeon Mobility drivers and was told to download automatix2 but all I see is Nvidia drivers, can anyone help?
you should skip Automatix2 and just go straight to ATI and download the drivers.  The combo installer works quite well
goto http://ati.amd.com/support/drivers/linux/linux-radeon.html and select ATI Driver Installer
thanks, I have downloaded the problem but the problem I was having was getting to to run, i am sure I am not using the right commands.
